name: Yellit!
description:
It’s the ultimate game-night app for friends and families – Yellit! is a fast-paced word description, acting and memory game.

Two teams battle it out over three rounds. In the first round players must describe as many of the words and phrases shown as they can before the timer runs out.

In the second round, the same words and phrases are jumbled up and players must describe them again, but using just three words.

In the final round players must again get their team mates to guess the same words and phrases, but this time without speaking at all.

The packs include hundreds of words and phrases keeping the game fresh and hugely entertaining time after time.
